content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for your interest in our apartment, Emilia Müller. To commence our discussion, let me start by stating a higher-than-expected initial price of 1250 Euros per month. However, if this figure doesn't meet your expectations, I'm afraid I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I'm determined to achieve the maximum rental income possible. But please feel free to propose a lower price if you wish to proceed.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I recognize your proposed rental price of 1250 Euros may not align with my intentions for the lowest possible cost. Nevertheless, let me initiate a negotiation with a lower counteroffer. 'I propose the price of 1100 Euros per month.'
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: While your suggested price of 1100 Euros is significantly lower than my initial proposal, it still leaves room for improvement from my perspective. I don't want to continue the negotiation at this point, because securing a higher rental income remains my top priority. However, I encourage you to reconsider your offer and think about how much lower you are willing to go, should you wish to resume discussions. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
